data.title: Closed! Sadly
data.text: The Sandwich Box was always a favorite go-to spot for our family for a good lunch. We especially liked the Cuban sandwich. But that is a moot point as they closed a little while ago and now Orange Sushi is in their place.

data.title: Out of business
data.text: This place was awesome but closed for some reason. Have no idea if they have relocated. This advisor won't let me post without more characters so here I go. **********

data.title: Great selection of freshly-made sandwiches!
data.text: The Sandwich Box is a family-owned sandwich shop that is a favorite here in Tustin.  They offer around 30 different sandwiches ranging from cold sandwiches like turkey, egg salad, cashew chicken salad and Italian cold cuts to hot sandwiches like Reubens, chicken parmesan, meatball, chicken teriyaki and a Mexican-style torta.  Their menu also features seven different salads, chili, several soups and teriyaki rice bowls.  And, their lemonade is delicious.  If you’re in Tustin around lunchtime, avoid the chains and visit the Sandwich Box!

data.title: Great deli
data.text: I go to this place frequently. Service is very fast and lots of selection and pleasant staff. I must admit although they have a large menu I only know about one thing cause I order the same thing every time - the cashew chicken salad. What can I say? It's hard to find a good chicken salad. I originally found this place because they are part of the dining for miles program with one of my airline frequent flyer programs (can't remember which one). I'm not sure if they are open for dinner, I always stop in at lunch.

data.title: Tortilla soup is great here, especially with half of a sandwich.
data.text: Tortilla soup is great here, especially with half of a sandwich.
